channel.title: I have made a forum to help players create their servers
channel.description:
Well, this is completly made to help players who are stuck on a step of making a server to get help by staff and me.. maybe even other players! we also give lists of a few sources, codes and tuts. instead of looking up everything, we can help other players with their server by talking to each other in either our chat box or maybe MSN or AIM if u have either. (i prefer MSN rather than AIM because i am on MSN more) now of course i have to tell you the forum.. MAKE SURE TO SIGN UP! and tell me if u go on and what u thought.. idc what ur answer is.
Forum - giggzserverhelp.smfforfree4.com Forum - giggzserverhelp.smfforfree4.com Forum - giggzserverhelp.smfforfree4.com Forum - giggzserverhelp.smfforfree4.com

item.title: I have made a forum to help players create their servers
item.dc:creator: @Runer_Queen_X Runer Queen X
item.description:
@Runer_Queen_X wrote:

lol get a real domain, and possibly a life. This forum isnt smfforfree. and im sure its more stable, and reliable then smfforfree.

this is pure SMF

IF you want to host your on website with mysql databases etc. A good website hosting company is

www.hostmonster.com

Read full topic
item.source: I have made a forum to help players create their servers

item.title: I have made a forum to help players create their servers
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Smfforfree fails and you know it, if you can’t afford a domain and hosting you won’t get far.

Read full topic
